item.content:encoded:
Indulge in the perfect balance of cheesy flavor and crunchy texture with Cheesy Crunch XL: 48 Snack Packs. These delightful crackers are crafted with a blend of premium ingredients, offering a satisfying snack experience that’s perfect for any occasion.

Key Takeaways
  • Convenience: Cheesy Crunch XL: 48 Snack Packs offer a convenient and portable snack option, ideal for travel, work, or outdoor activities.
  • Taste: Customers praise the delicious flavor profile of these crackers, noting their satisfying combination of cheese and cracker.
  • Value: While the price may be slightly higher than individual boxes, the bulk packaging provides excellent value for frequent consumers.
  • Packaging: Some customers have raised concerns about the packaging, finding it inconvenient to open.
Check price

Ingredients

  • Unbleached enriched flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate [vitamin B1], riboflavin [vitamin B2], folic acid)  
  • Palm oil
  • Soybean and/or canola oil  
  • Whey (from milk)
  • Cornstarch
  • Sugar
  • Semi-soft cheese powder (pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes)
  • High fructose corn syrup
  • Buttermilk
  • Salt
  • Leavening (calcium phosphate, baking soda)
  • Natural flavor
  • Soy lecithin
  • Sodium phosphate
  • Lactic acid  
  • Sodium caseinate (from milk)
  • Turmeric and annatto extracts (for color)

Nutrition Facts

  • Serving size: 1 cracker (16g)
  • Calories: 80
  • Total fat: 3.5g
  • Saturated fat: 1g
  • Trans fat: 0g
  • Cholesterol: 5mg
  • Sodium: 170mg
  • Total carbohydrates: 11g
  • Dietary fiber: 1g
  • Sugars: 2g
  • Protein: 2g

Customer Satisfaction

While we’ve received overwhelmingly positive feedback from our customers, we understand that everyone’s experience is unique. We’ve taken steps to address any concerns raised and continue to strive for excellence in both product quality and customer service.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is this product gluten-free?

No, this product contains wheat.

How long does this product last?

The product has a shelf life of several months when stored properly in a cool, dry place.

What is the best way to store these crackers?

Store the crackers in a sealed container at room temperature.

Experience the Cheesy Crunch Difference

Indulge in the irresistible combination of cheesy flavor and crunchy texture with Cheesy Crunch XL: 48 Snack Packs. Whether you’re looking for a quick and satisfying snack or a delicious addition to your meal, these crackers are sure to please.

Order your Cheesy Crunch XL today and discover why they’re a customer favorite!

Check price

Made with real cheese and Kosher certified, Cheesy Crunch offers a satisfying and […]
item.content:encoded:
Indulge in a taste of nostalgia with Cheesy Crunch: 20 Snack Packs. Discover the perfect balance of crispy crackers and creamy cheese filling in every bite. These individually wrapped snacks are ideal for on-the-go enjoyment, whether you’re at work, school, or traveling. Made with real cheese and Kosher certified, Cheesy Crunch offers a satisfying and convenient snack experience. Don’t miss out on this classic treat – order your 20-pack today!

Key Takeaways
  • Flavorful and Classic: Cheesy Crunch: 20 Snack Packs offer a nostalgic flavor profile that appeals to consumers of all ages.
  • Convenient and Portable: Each individual snack pack makes it easy to enjoy these crackers on the go, whether at work, school, or during travel.
  • Value for Money: The 20-pack format provides excellent value, making it a great option for stocking up or sharing.
  • Versatile Snack: These crackers can be enjoyed on their own, with dips, or as a topping for soups and salads.
Check price

A Classic Snack, Now in a Convenient 20-Pack Format

Indulge in the timeless flavor of Cheesy Crunch, now available in a convenient 20-pack format. Each individual snack pack offers a satisfying combination of crispy, buttery crackers and a smooth, creamy cheese filling, making it the perfect on-the-go snack.

Ingredients

  • Unbleached enriched flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate [vitamin B1], riboflavin [vitamin B2], folic acid)  
  • Palm oil
  • Soybean and/or canola oil  
  • Whey (from milk)
  • Cornstarch
  • Sugar
  • Semi-soft cheese powder (pasteurized milk, cheese cultures, salt, enzymes)
  • High fructose corn syrup
  • Buttermilk
  • Salt
  • Leavening (calcium phosphate, baking soda)
  • Natural flavor
  • Soy lecithin
  • Sodium phosphate
  • Lactic acid  
  • Sodium caseinate (from milk)
  • Turmeric and annatto extracts (for color)

Contains: Wheat, milk, soy. May contain: Peanut.

  • Flavor: Cheese
  • Brand: Ritz
  • Item Weight: 1.86 Pounds
  • Allergen Information: Milk, Wheat, Soy
  • Specialty: Kosher

Product Description

One box of 20 snack packs of RITZ Cheese Sandwich Crackers, 6 crackers per pack.

Cracker sandwich features smooth, creamy cheese between two crisp RITZ snack crackers.

Filling made with real cheese, Kosher.

Portable, on-the-go travel snack packs for home, work or school.

Individual bulk snack packs keep RITZ cheese crackers fresh and are great for vending machines and food pantries.

Product Features

  • Individual Snack Packs: Each snack pack is individually sealed for freshness and convenience, making it easy to enjoy on the go.
  • Real Cheese Filling: The filling is made with real cheese, delivering a rich and satisfying flavor.
  • Kosher Certified: These crackers are Kosher certified, making them suitable for those who follow dietary restrictions.
  • Versatile Snack: Enjoy Cheesy Crunch on their own, with dips, or as a topping for soups and salads.

Customer Satisfaction

While we have received positive feedback from many customers, we understand that individual experiences may vary. Some customers have noted that the crackers are a bit salty, while others have appreciated their convenience and flavor.

We are committed to providing a high-quality product and encourage customers to share their feedback with us so we can continue to improve.

Frequently Asked Questions

Are these crackers gluten-free?

No, they contain wheat.

What is the shelf life?

The shelf life is typically printed on the packaging.

Can I buy these in bulk?

Yes, you can purchase larger quantities for wholesale or resale.

Why Choose Cheesy Crunch?

  • Nostalgic Flavor: The classic combination of crispy crackers and creamy cheese filling is sure to evoke fond memories.
  • Convenient and Portable: Enjoy these crackers anytime, anywhere with the convenient 20-pack format.
  • High-Quality Ingredients: Made with real cheese and other quality ingredients.
  • Affordable Price: The 20-pack format offers excellent value for money.

Order Your Cheesy Crunch Today!

Don’t miss out on this delicious and convenient snack. Order your Cheesy Crunch: 20 Snack Packs today and experience the classic flavor you’ve been craving.

Check price

item.title: Peanut Butter Pals: 20 Snack Packs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Are you craving a classic, satisfying snack that’s both convenient and delicious? Look no further than Peanut Butter Pals! This irresistible treat combines the creamy goodness of peanut butter with the crisp texture of RITZ crackers, offering a flavor that’s sure to delight your taste buds. Each box contains 20 individual snack packs, perfect for […]
item.content:encoded:
Are you craving a classic, satisfying snack that’s both convenient and delicious? Look no further than Peanut Butter Pals! This irresistible treat combines the creamy goodness of peanut butter with the crisp texture of RITZ crackers, offering a flavor that’s sure to delight your taste buds. Each box contains 20 individual snack packs, perfect for on-the-go enjoyment. With their high-quality ingredients and unbeatable value, Peanut Butter Pals are the ideal choice for busy individuals and families alike. Discover why this beloved snack has captured the hearts of countless people around the world!

Key Takeaways:
  • Product: Peanut Butter Pals: 20 Snack Packs
  • Unique Selling Points:
    • Large quantity at a competitive price
    • Convenient, individual snack packs
    • Classic RITZ cracker with real peanut butter filling
    • Kosher certified
  • Target Audience: Families, individuals looking for a quick and easy snack, and businesses like schools and vending machine operators.
Check price

Indulge in the Classic Taste of Peanut Butter and RITZ Crackers

Introducing Peanut Butter Pals, the perfect on-the-go snack that combines the irresistible flavors of creamy peanut butter and crispy RITZ crackers. Each box contains 20 individual snack packs, each featuring two RITZ crackers sandwiched together with a generous layer of real peanut butter. Whether you’re heading to work, school, or simply need a quick pick-me-up, Peanut Butter Pals are the ideal snack to satisfy your cravings.

Why Choose Peanut Butter Pals?

  • Convenience: Our individual snack packs are easy to grab and go, making them perfect for busy lifestyles.
  • Taste: Enjoy the classic combination of peanut butter and RITZ crackers, a flavor that has been loved for generations.
  • Quality: We use only the finest ingredients, including real peanut butter and high-quality RITZ crackers.
  • Value: With 20 snack packs per box, Peanut Butter Pals offer excellent value for your money.

Ingredients and Nutrition Facts

Ingredients: Unbleached enriched flour (wheat flour, niacin, reduced iron, thiamine mononitrate [vitamin B1], riboflavin [vitamin B2], folic acid), peanut butter (roasted peanuts, hydrogenated vegetable oil [rapeseed and cottonseed oils], salt), soybean and/or canola oil, sugar, palm oil, dextrose, cornstarch, high fructose corn syrup, salt, leavening (calcium phosphate, baking soda), soy lecithin.  

Contains: Wheat, peanut, soy. May contain: Milk.

Nutrition Facts

  • Serving Size: 2 crackers
  • Calories: 160
  • Total Fat: 8g
  • Saturated Fat: 1.5g
  • Trans Fat: 0g
  • Cholesterol: 0mg
  • Sodium: 200mg
  • Total Carbohydrates: 21g
  • Dietary Fiber: 1g
  • Sugars: 4g
  • Protein: 4g

Discover the Perfect Snack for Every Occasion

Peanut Butter Pals are versatile snacks that can be enjoyed by people of all ages. Whether you’re a busy parent looking for a healthy snack for your kids or a student in need of a quick energy boost, Peanut Butter Pals are the perfect choice.

Here are a few ideas for enjoying Peanut Butter Pals

  • Pack them in your lunchbox: Peanut Butter Pals are a great way to add a touch of sweetness and crunch to your lunch.
  • Enjoy them as a snack: Grab a snack pack and enjoy a delicious and satisfying treat.
  • Share them with friends and family: Peanut Butter Pals are perfect for sharing with loved ones.

Order Your Peanut Butter Pals Today

Don’t miss out on the delicious taste of Peanut Butter Pals. Order your box today and experience the perfect combination of peanut butter and RITZ crackers.

Check price
